articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: NFL legend and Colorado coach Deion Sanders may have left foot amputated - The Guardian
articles.description: Hall of Famer Deion Sanders might lose his left foot as a result of circulation issues that forced him to have two toes amputated in 2021
articles.content:
Deion Sanders might lose his left foot as a result of circulation issues that forced him to have two toes amputated in 2021.
